```{r eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, error=TRUE, fig.align='right', fig.height=19.75*1*0.7, fig.pos="H", fig.width=21*1.4142*0.75, warning=FALSE, resize.height="19cm", results='asis'}

cat("\\begin{textblock*}{2cm}(-8cm,0cm)")
cat("\\section{MEASUREMENTS}")
cat("\\end{textblock*}")

variable_1 = c("A", "B")
variable_2 = c("red", "blue")

i = 1
for(x in variable_1){

  cat("\\begin{textblock*}{2cm}(-8cm,0cm)")
  cat(as.character(sprintf("\\subsection{%s}", x)))
  cat("\\end{textblock*}")
  
  for(y in variable_2){
    
    cat("\\begin{textblock*}{2cm}(-8cm,32cm)")
    cat(as.character(sprintf("\\subsubsection{%s}", y)))
    cat("\\end{textblock*}")
    
    data=head(mtcars, 30)
    plot = ggplot(data, aes(x=wt, y=mpg)) +
      geom_point() + # Show dots
      geom_text(
        label=rownames(data), 
        nudge_x = 0.25, nudge_y = 0.25, 
        check_overlap = T
      )
      
    print(
      ggdraw(xlim = c(-0.1, 1.135), ylim = c(0, 1)) +
        draw_plot(plot, x = 0, y = 2/3, width = .5, height = 1/3) +
        draw_plot(plot, x = 0, y = 1/3, width = .5, height = 1/3) +
        draw_plot(plot, x = 0, y = 0, width = .5, height = 1/3) +
        draw_plot(plot, x = 0.5, y = 0, width = .5, height = 1/3) +
        draw_plot(plot, x = 0.5, y = 1/3, width = .5, height = 2/3) +
        draw_label(
          toupper(sprintf("%s plots [%s]", x, y)),
          x = 1.042, y = 0.5, angle = 270, fontfamily = "Helvetica", size = 36)
    )
    
    cat("\\input{./footer}")
    
    if(i != 4){cat("\n\n\\pagebreak\n")}
    i = i+1
  }
  
}
```
